fullplot: When an entire town in upstate New York is closed down by an unexpected snowfall, a "snow day" begins when a group of elementary school kids, led by Natalie Brandston, try to ensure that the schools stay closed by stopping a mechanical snowplow driver by trying to hijack his plow truck. Meanwhile, Natalie's big brother Hal is using this day to try to win the affections of Claire Bonner, the most popular girl in his high school, while Hal and Natalie's father Tom, a TV meteorologist, faces off against a rival meteorologist for weather coverage of the day's events.
plot: When a school in upstate New York is snowed in, a group of students hi-jack a plow to keep the school closed.
title: Snow Day

tomatoes.consensus: Weak assembly of characters and story lines made this movie forgettable and silly.
